result.html: thug tú an freagra mícheartYou gave the wrong answer.
result.ponchtml: ṫug tú an freagra míċeartYou gave the wrong answer.

result.eng: It was obvious you couldn't decide on the most suitable answer.
result.ga: ba léir go raibh tú idir dhá chomhairle maidir leis an fhreagra is oiriúnaí
result.orig: Ba léir go raibh tú idir dhá chomhairle maidir leis an fhreagra is oiriúnaí
result.html: ba léir go raibh tú idir dhá chomhairle maidir leis an fhreagra is oiriúnaíIt was obvious you couldn't decide on the most suitable answer.
result.ponchtml: ba léir go raiḃ tú idir ḋá ċoṁairle maidir leis an ḟreagra is oiriúnaíIt was obvious you couldn't decide on the most suitable answer.

result.eng: What does he say when he doesn't have the right answer?
result.ga: cad a deir sé nuair nach mbíonn an freagra ceart aige
result.orig: Cad a deir sé nuair nach mbíonn an freagra ceart aige
result.html: cad a deir sé nuair nach mbíonn an freagra ceart aigeWhat does he say when he doesn't have the right answer?
result.ponchtml: cad a deir sé nuair naċ mbíonn an freagra ceart aigeWhat does he say when he doesn't have the right answer?

result.eng: He asked me a question but I didn't answer him.
result.ga: chuir sé ceist orm ach níor thug mé freagra dó
result.orig: Chuir sé ceist orm ach níor thug mé freagra dó
result.html: chuir sé ceist orm ach níor thug mé freagra dóHe asked me a question but I didn't answer him.
result.ponchtml: ċuir sé ceist orm aċ níor ṫug mé freagra dóHe asked me a question but I didn't answer him.

result.eng: The government's response to the economic crisis.
result.ga: freagra an rialtais ar an ghéarchéim eacnamaíochta
result.orig: Freagra an rialtais ar an ghéarchéim eacnamaíochta
result.html: freagra an rialtais ar an ghéarchéim eacnamaíochtaThe government's response to the economic crisis.
result.ponchtml: freagra an rialtais ar an ġéarċéim eacnamaíoċtaThe government's response to the economic crisis.

result.eng: She kept on complaining until she got an answer.
result.ga: lean sí ag gearán léi go bhfuair sí freagra
result.orig: Lean sí ag gearán léi go bhfuair sí freagra
result.html: lean sí ag gearán léi go bhfuair sí freagraShe kept on complaining until she got an answer.
result.ponchtml: lean sí ag gearán léi go ḃfuair sí freagraShe kept on complaining until she got an answer.

result.eng: I haven't gotten an answer to my question yet.
result.ga: ní bhfuair mé freagra ar mo cheist go fóill
result.orig: Ní bhfuair mé freagra ar mo cheist go fóill
result.html: ní bhfuair mé freagra ar mo cheist go fóillI haven't gotten an answer to my question yet.
result.ponchtml: ní ḃfuair mé freagra ar mo ċeist go fóillI haven't gotten an answer to my question yet.

result.eng: This is not the answer to the question.
result.ga: ní freagra na ceiste é seo
result.orig: Ní freagra na ceiste é seo
result.html: ní freagra na ceiste é seoThis is not the answer to the question.
result.ponchtml: ní freagra na ceiste é seoThis is not the answer to the question.

result.eng: You do not have to state your address but if you do, we will be able to reply personally.
result.ga: ní gá duit seoladh a thabhairt ach má dhéanann tú amhlaidh beidh muid in ann freagra pearsanta a thabhairt
result.orig: Ní gá duit seoladh a thabhairt ach má dhéanann tú amhlaidh beidh muid in ann freagra pearsanta a thabhairt
result.html: ní gá duit seoladh a thabhairt ach má dhéanann tú amhlaidh beidh muid in ann freagra pearsanta a thabhairtYou do not have to state your address but if you do, we will be able to reply personally.
result.ponchtml: ní gá duit seolaḋ a ṫaḃairt aċ má ḋéanann tú aṁlaiḋ beiḋ muid in ann freagra pearsanta a ṫaḃairtYou do not have to state your address but if you do, we will be able to reply personally.

result.eng: I don't have the answer to your question.
result.html: níl freagra do cheiste agamI don't have the answer to your question.
result.ponchtml: níl freagra do ċeiste agamI don't have the answer to your question.

result.ga: sin é an freagra ceart
result.html: sin é an freagra ceartThat is the right answer.
result.ponchtml: sin é an freagra ceartThat is the right answer.
